mapper.update: update account set token=#{token} where id=#{id}
update account set token=#{newToken} where token=#{oldToken}
mapper.delete: delete a.* from account a, employee e where e.id=a.employee_id and e.mobile=#{mobile}
mapper.select: select a.*, e.mobile, e.name, e.avatar, e.thumb_avatar from account a left join employee e on a.employee_id=e.id where e.mobile = #{mobile} limit 1
select a.*, e.mobile, e.name, e.avatar, e.thumb_avatar from account a left join employee e on a.employee_id=e.id where a.token = #{token} limit 1
select a.*, e.mobile, e.name, e.avatar, e.thumb_avatar from account a left join employee e on a.employee_id=e.id order by a.creation_time desc
select a.*, e.mobile, e.name, e.avatar, e.thumb_avatar from account a left join employee e on a.employee_id=e.id order by a.creation_time desc limit #{offset}, #{limit}
